name: You and Them
description:
A small game made for #WeelyGameJam. The theme was "You're the ennemy"

This is a puzzle game where you must eliminate the ennemy, but you also control them. A level is complete when all your characters survive and all the bad ones die.

Controls :

W A S D or arrow key to move

R to reload level

Q to quit a level

N to load the next level if you won

Characters : 

Blue : Player who moves in the direction you want him to.

Light Blue : Player who moves in the opposite direction you want him to.

Red : Bad guy who moves in the direction you want him to.

Purple : Bad guy  who moves in the opposite direction you want him to.

Credits : 

All sounds are from this asset : 

Ultimate Game Music Collection

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/ultimate-game-music-collection-37351
